page.title: 03A Pub in Cheadle Hulme.
page.content: The pub has been open for 27 years and the landlord and his wife have been working there for 4 months. They have 28 people working part-time. They get plenty of customers,about 400 a day. Unfortunately there is no entertainment but they intend to have some in the future. They serve food and the customers' favourite is steak and kidney pie. The opening times are 11.00 am to 3.00 pm and 5.30 pm to 11.00 pm,except Sundays when it is open 12 noon to 2.30 and 7.00 pm to 10.30. { Jobs Landlord Landlady -------- -------- Restocking bars Preparing food Cleaning cellar Serving food Preparing bar Helping cleaners Ordering stock Helping staff Preparing tills Planning Menu
